item.title: [DELTA]Commands[DELTA]
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Steve Epic Steve
item.description:
@Epic_Steve wrote:

[quote=“mark033, post:7, topic:390962”][quote author=durial12 link=topic=486911.msg3568744#msg3568744 date=1302880503]
Well, I used my brain and thought that maybe this person doesn’t have the knowledge to make their own code hence why they asked for help here. I remember when I first started, too: if I didn’t know a code and someone told me it, I would take it, look at it and learn from it. I hope that’s what people do in here too.

So yeah, maybe it is spoonfeeding, but it’s either that or link them to a Java tutorial which will make no sense to them atall.
[/quote]

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,331370.0.html

3. We are not a spoonfeeding community… etc

Don’t. Do. It.

N.B. He won’t even have a chance of learning shit if you don’t try to use proper conventions when “teaching” him.[/quote]
How many topics have you seen locked because of no “prior knowledge or work to the problem”. I’ve seen… None. Seems the rules no longer apply.

Read full topic

item.title: [DELTA]Commands[DELTA]

item.description:
@mark033 wrote:

I am helping him, you’re doing him a disservice. You’re giving him code teaching him 2 things:

  1. Nothing, I can ask on Mopar Halps and I win

  2. Bad conventions

It has shit-all to do with helping people obviously, because you’re not, it seems more like you just want some gratitude.

item.title: [DELTA]Commands[DELTA]
item.dc:creator: @durial12 durial12
item.description:
@durial12 wrote:

Mark, I appreciate what you are trying to say, but I could have only said one of a few things:

  1. Be a dick and just say no/not reply.
  2. Tell them to use google.
  3. Take 3 seconds out of my time and find a code for them.

Since I’m nice and wasn’t particularly busy, I decided to choose number 3. Now stop replying to this trying to undermine someone, and go help people.

Read full topic

I remember when I first started, too: if I didn’t know a code and someone told me it, I would take it, look at it and learn from it. I hope that’s what people do in here too.

So yeah, maybe it is spoonfeeding, but it’s either that or link them to a Java tutorial which will make no sense to them atall.[/quote]

item.title: [DELTA]Commands[DELTA]
item.dc:creator: @durial12 durial12
item.description:
@durial12 wrote:

Well, I used my brain and thought that maybe this person doesn’t have the knowledge to make their own code hence why they asked for help here. I remember when I first started, too: if I didn’t know a code and someone told me it, I would take it, look at it and learn from it. I hope that’s what people do in here too.

So yeah, maybe it is spoonfeeding, but it’s either that or link them to a Java tutorial which will make no sense to them atall.

Read full topic

item.title: [DELTA]Commands[DELTA]
item.dc:creator: @durial12 durial12
item.description:
@durial12 wrote:

[code=java]if (command.startsWith(“unipban”) && playerRights > 3) {
try {
String victim = command.substring(5);
BufferedReader in = new BufferedReader(new FileReader(“config//ipbans.txt”));
BufferedWriter out = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter(“config//ipbans.txt”));
String unban = command.substring(6);
String inFile;

while ((inFile = in.readLine()) != null) {
if (inFile.equalsIgnoreCase(unban)) {// Leave this blank we dont want it to write a file.
} else {
out.write(inFile);
}

}
} catch (IOException e) {
e.printStackTrace();
}
}[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: [DELTA]Commands[DELTA]
item.dc:creator: @Blood-Killers Blood-Killers
item.description:
@Blood-Killers wrote:

You may have to change things to fit your server or likings.

if (command.startsWith("unipmuteuser") && playerRights > 1) { try { StringTokenizer st = new StringTokenizer(command, "-"); if(st.countTokens() == 2) { st.nextToken(); String otherPName = st.nextToken(); int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName); if (otherPIndex != -1) { client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex]; deleteFromFile("config/mutes2.txt", p.connectedFrom); p.muted = false; p.sM("You have been un-ip muted by " + playerName); } sM(otherPName + " has been un-ip muted."); } } catch (Exception e) { sM("Enter a username you want to un ip mute."); } }

I don’t have unipban but I have unban.

Read full topic
